Manasseh, one of the Twelve Tribes

Manasseh or Menashe ×Ö°× Ö·×©Ö¶Ö¼××” was, according to the Book of Genesis, the first son of Joseph and Asenath.

Manasseh was born in Egypt before the arrival of the children of Israel from Canaan (Genesis 48:5).
